Name: Soldier
Description: Melee range. Kinda stupid. Useful cannon fodder.

Name: Ranger
Description: Ranged range. Good at throwing stuff.

Name: Tank
Description: Melee range. Good at hitting hard. Too dumb to go down easy.

Name: Healer
Description: Area of Effect. Keeps kids alive longer to suffer more.

Name: Scout
Description: Good at snooping. Keep them busy so they don't report you.

Name: Farmer
Description: Has a shovel. Can collect sand. Possibly useful.

Name: Candy Factory
Description: Place to store candy you bribe your kid army with.
